description: Numbers n such that n and 5n + 8 are both prime.
comments: Except for the first term all others are congruent to 1 mod 6 because 5(6n+5)+8 is divisible by 3. - _Zak Seidov_, Aug 23 2012
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..1000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(5*n+8)]; // Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2010
author: _David W. Wilson_
